original_text: And the young woman pleased him and won his favor. And he quickly provided her with her cosmetics and her portion of food, and with seven chosen young women from the king's palace, and advanced her and her young women to the best place in the harem.
korean_text: 헤개가 이 처녀를 좋게 보고 은혜를 베풀어 몸을 정결하게 할 물품과 일용품을 곧 주며 또 왕궁에서 으레 주는 일곱 궁녀를 주고 에스더와 그 궁녀들을 후궁 아름다운 처소로 옮기더라

sentences.original_text: And the young woman pleased him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 소녀는 그의 마음에 들었다

sentences.original_text: And he quickly provided her with her cosmetics
and with seven chosen young women from the king's palace,
and advanced her and her young women
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀와 그녀의 시녀들을 높은 곳으로 옮기고

sentences.original_text: to the best place in the harem.
